question: 主催
sourceMnemonic: The <kanji>master</kanji> who <kanji>sponsor</kanji>s you is the one who provides your <vocabulary>sponsorship</vocabulary>. Without this person, you wouldn't have sponsorship at all, which is why you call them "master" (plus, that was one of the rules with the sponsorship).
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
